--- In junit@y..., Robert Sartin <sartin@a...> wrote:
> 
> --- "Di Iorio, Matthew (ISS Atlanta)" <mdiiorio@i...> wrote:
> > Yes, in my experience, tearDown is always called.  From the JUnit
> > code:
> 
> Unless setUp() fails with any Throwable....

Laurent,

If you need it, try this patch which puts the setUp call inside the 
try block:

https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&aid=436182&group_id=15278&atid=315278
